messages.title: BORIS ANSWERS THE BIG QUESTIONS
messages.content: Representatives from residents' associations across Uxbridge & South Ruislip grilled Boris on local issues.

messages.title: Faster, smoother, more reliable Tube
messages.content: Boris upgrades have given Hillingdon residents more reliable, more frequent and more often Tube services.

messages.title: An independent view on our area.
messages.content: Good transport links directly into Central London remain the area's favourite point with families and professionals.

messages.title: No to Heathrow expansion
messages.content: 70% of Uxbridge & South Ruislip voters said 'No' when asked if Heathrow should build a third runway.

messages.title: INVESTING IN MENTAL HEALTH SERVICES
messages.content: Conservative-run Hillingdon Council has been praised for the way it supports people who need help tackling mental health problems.

messages.title: Labour's tax on family homes
messages.content: Families and pensioners hit by the hated of Labour's Mansion Tax.

messages.title: HELPING YOU KEEP MORE OF YOUR HARD-EARNED CASH
INCREASING THE STATE PENSION AND PROTECTING THE FREEDOM PASS
messages.content: Pensioners in Uxbridge and South Ruislip have seen their State Pension increase thanks to Boris Johnson and the Conservatives.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Work on upgrades have given Hillingdon residents more reliable, more frequent and more often Tube services.
Uxbridge leisure centre is popular throughout the year with its gym, fitness classes, 50m swimming pool, and a restored outdoor Lido.
Boris Johnson backs local residents against Heathrow expansion, fighting to keep disruption down.
Conservatives have cut Council Tax, allowing residents to keep more of their money.
Opposition to Labour's Mansion Tax, which would impact family homes.
State Pension has increased and Freedom Pass protection for local pensioners.

issues.health: Conservative-run Hillingdon Council has been praised for the way it supports people who need help tackling mental health problems.

housing.content: Families and pensioners hit by the hated of Labour's Mansion Tax.

leaflet.personalStatement: A personal message from JOHN RANDALL MP

politicalExperience.achievements: Boris' close involvement in Uxbridge & South Ruislip whilst Mayor of London shows he really understands local residents.

contactInformation.address: Boris Johnson, Bay Lodge, 36 Harefield Road, Uxbridge, Middlesex UB8 1PH

endorsements.endorsement: A personal message endorsing Boris Johnson and his efforts in Uxbridge & South Ruislip.

images.caption: A collection of images showing Boris Johnson engaging with the community and local officials.
